name: Hylee's Little Potion Shop
description:
Good morning, my dear Hylee,

If you are reading this letter, congratulations! I was called back for a few days by my colleagues in a nearby town, and I will be unable to take care of the shop for this time. For this reason I have decided to leave it in your care, my young apprentice. Mind this place, as my precious refuge and main refueling place for adventurers from all overland, and I recommend that you always treat everyone to your best. No one in here would be able to handle this place better than you, so you have all my confidence. So I would do a great job.

Have a nice day, your teacher, Neri.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Q - Drop object

F - Interact

The game supports pads for Xbox, PlayStation and Switch (even on UI)
